Comment.Verse: \v 25 Jehu said to Bidkar \x + \xo 9:25 \xt [ch. 7:2] \x*his aide, “Take him up and throw him \x + \xo 9:25 \xt [See ver. 21 above] \x*on the plot of ground belonging to Naboth the Jezreelite. For remember, when you and I rode side by side behind Ahab his father, how \x + \xo 9:25 \xt 1 Kgs. 21:19, 29 \x*the \nd Lord\nd* made this \x + \xo 9:25 \xt See Isa. 13:1\x*pronouncement against him:

Contents.p: Paratext has identified a single term which should be two different terms. Please review the renderings that Paratext copied to both מַשָּׂא-1 and מַשָּׂא-2. These are now separate terms.
Paratext has identified a single term which should be two different terms. Please review the renderings that Paratext copied to both מַשָּׂא-2 and מַשָּׂא-1. These are now separate terms.

Comment.Verse: \v 1 In the \x + \xo 1:1 \xt Job 38:4-7; Ps. 33:6; 136:5; Isa. 42:5; 45:18; John 1:1-3; Acts 14:15; 17:24; Col. 1:16, 17; Heb. 1:10; 11:3; Rev. 4:11\x*beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.

Contents.p: Please do not edit this term. Any edits you make will be lost because a newer version of Paratext has replaced this term with another term. Upgrade to the latest version of Paratext to use the new term: מַשָּׂא-1
